div.p:
Pride, Rockets kept opponents’ backs to the mat By Dick Maloney
Clermont Northeastern High School takes great pride in its wrestling program, and this year Pride was at the forefront. ...

On Monday, April 27th student meals will be available for pick-up at locations throughout the district. This will be the only food delivery next week and will occur 10:00a-11:30a, just look for the yellow bus!
There will be a Community Mobile Pantry on Monday, April 27th at CNE Middle School, 10a-11:30a. This is sponsored by members of the community and in addition to the meals delivered by the school.

There will be a Community Mobile Pantry on Tuesday, April 21st at CNE Middle School, 10a-11a. This is sponsored by members of the community and in addition to the meals delivered by the school. Please register at http://tinyurl.com/CNEMobilePantry

On Monday, April 20th student meals will be available for pick-up at locations throughout the district. This will be the only food delivery next week and will occur 10:00a-11:30a, just look for the yellow bus!
